name: RadioInfoBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Daily news updates about what's happening in the radio and podcast industries from radioinfo.com.au and asiaradiotoday.com. 
You can just say "Alexa, play my Radio Info Briefing".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
